description:
JavaScript Obfuscator for Node.js is an open-source node library that protects your JS code from being stolen or used without permission.

You can install it with "npm install javascript-obfuscator --save"

It has features like debug protection, self-defending and domain lock.

You can also use an online demo here: https://javascriptobfuscator.herokuapp.com/

If you're using webpack, it also features a companion webpack plugin.
name: JavaScript Obfuscator for Node.js
